content.detailedDescription: I went out to the front of my house, to check my christmas lights. it was a clear sunny day; as i stared up at the sky. a first thought i ruled out, planes, helicopters and birds. they made uniformed patterns as they hovered at in a straight line going n.E.. my first thoughts were that of a flock of geese at a high altitude. what made me rule out planes, copters, and birds was their constant changing patterns and they aligned in unison for each pattern. to me they seemed like silver colored disc. i wished my son would have seen it or my friends, but luck!. i went to the house to retrieve my digital camera; by then they were too far but i still snapped 3 pictures. after taking the useless photos; kept staring till they were too faint.
content.summary: Went out side; it was a clear sunny day. as i looked up at the sky, i noticed about 20 silver disk, aligning themselves into uniformed patterns. by the time i got a  camera they were too faint.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,
while taking a photo of the moon and star in the morning sky (between 06:45am and 07:00am) eastern on december 7th, 2015, an object moved into my picture frame.  i took several pictures of the moon and star, and three photos of this disk shaped object.  the camera is the one on my iphone 6.  i was not trying to take the photos of the object as i really did not pay any attention to it until i went into the house and my wife and i looked at the photos.  i immediately went back outside to take more photos, but the object was no longer visible.


thanks,

mark
content.summary: Morning sky photo of disk shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
Revelation:...
last night, or rather this morning, at around 2am, my partner experienced an abduction, in johannesburg, south africa.
she was asleep, and found herself searching, for something unknown.
then, she 'knew' that there was something, that came from the earth, that resembled a square mist, that had copper strands inside it.
she remembered that this thing became visible, and she was devastated, because she would then not be able to reach the perfect stuff. she got upset and tried to awaken me, but i just lay still.
then, she accompanied her 'young grey', and recalls floating above flowers and grass, a small patch, and then came face to face with an older, very large grey. she called him wisdom.
he then, telepathically spoke. she told him what's she saw and what happened with the mist thing..
he told her:
" we, (referring to himself and the others behind him, and to me fareed,) can never become tainted. never ever."
she felt intense overwhelming feeling of love, and he took her hand, opened it, and put in a necklace with an infinity sign, which shone brightly and was covered in darkness. he then said " you may go now."
she then, accompanied by her younger grey, left to go back to bed. she then woke up.
this was a full recollection of the abduction of this morning, and a message from the greys.
content.summary: Grey abduction event with revelation to be made public

content.detailedDescription: I was on the porch and something caught my eye. lights that were spinning and moving in the sky i see planes and helicopter all the time and this was not it. it stopped and spun after going south a couple minutes went south a little more and then spun going upwards and it was gone.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Traveling then stopped and skinned continues straight then went up and disappereaed

content.detailedDescription: I was out outside looking for another sighting as soon as it was dark. the unusual symmetrical shape and altitude and the movement ( hell everything ). the first night (12-04-2015 ) they were stationary; tonight they moved, ever so slowly. my feelings were normal, i have no fear of such things. i only lost sight of them when i went inside for a while. when i went outside again, they were there; in different locations.
content.summary: Four white lights in a squire formation w/ red light at center

content.detailedDescription: It was very bizarre, and the pics i took do not do it justice, as this was only with my iphone at night(they were bright to have that pic it up).  there were like 18 of them all in a pattern.
content.summary: It was very bizarre, and the pics i took do not do it justice, as this was only with my iphone at night(they were bright to have that pic it up).  there were like 18 of them all in a pattern.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were sealing the gutters on my house, i was on a ladder, facing north. my friend was looking at a pine tree in my yard that is starting to lean towards the house and telling me it needed to be removed when he suddenly noticed the object to the south of us, he said, " can you look back at this plane without getting dizzy?, " i turned around to look at it and by this time it was almost directly over us, the first thing i said was, it doesn't have wings, the craft was silent, my friend told me to get my phone and i started recording as it was coming over my house heading north over lake, it soon came out of view, i'm ex military i've seen all types of aircraft i've never seen anything like this, it appeared to be about a mile to 10,000 ft above us.
content.summary: Unidentified i just flew over my friend and i while working on my gutters

content.detailedDescription: On september 29th.At around 7:50p.M. i walked out of our 5th.Wheel trailer to the bottom of the steps and looked up to the sky as i am an avid sky watcher. i quickly noticed what appeared to be a very bright star at 140 degrees s.E.And 60 degrees off the horizon.I know a bright star should not be there at this time.I watched for about 30 seconds and it dimmed by about 75% and started moving slowly north.After 10 minutes the object was aprox.80 degrees west and 70 degrees off the horizon. i ran inside to get my binoculars and when i got back outside it took around 5 minutes for me to find the object again as it had dimmed again.At that moment the object was aporox.40 degrees and still 70 degrees off the horizon, a bright flash came from the object.It was as if a large camera flashed.I followed the object with my binoculars moving e.N.E. slowly.Every minute or so the object would flash brightly.A friend walked up at that time and witnessed the last two flashes.In all i witnessed 8 flashes as the object moved e.N.E. and out of my sight.The event lasted for about 30 minutes.I wrote the details of this sighting that evening as well as compass readings.My binoculars are 10x50 power.I researched to see if anyone else reported anything on 29th september in my area and found a report at another reporting site not unlike my sighting.
content.summary: Starlike light moving slowly north with bright flashes of light

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on a gravel road when up ahead of me i saw what looked like 2 bright streaks in the sky. the trail didn't continue to lengthen, like a jet's trail. the size stayed the same. it was all moving upward, but almost imperceptibly. as i drove closer, i got out a pair of binoculars. i saw a round object, with a domed top. it has what looked like flames coming out of it. as it neared the sun, i saw a glint on the top of it. it seemed to be a silver or chrome sort of color. it traveled upward the whole time i watched it. i stopped tracking it as it got too close to the sun for me to observe it. i traveled on, and when i looked backed around a minute and half later, i didn't see it anymore.
content.summary: Round object with domed top, silver or chrome color, flames coming out

content.detailedDescription: I was observing the planet venus to search for comet catalina nearby with powerfull 25x100 binoculars on a tripod. just to the left (north ) of venus i thought was the green comet named catalina. but i was really seeing a short, bright motionless,hovering glowing rod or cylinder with a diameter 1/2 the diameter of venus when looking through 25x100 binoculars. it stayed in the same place in the clear predawn sky . it never moved. it seemed to be in the same place that comet catalina would be-but i never saw the comet-just the glowing cylinder, through binoculars.I felt puzzled that : could this be comet catalina? there was no cometary tail. all the took place in the backyard of my apartment building (the north side lawn of my apartment building). i quit observing the object around 5:55 am est to begin my daily chores of the day . i plan to go out on monday dec 7, 2015 at 5:00 am est to see if the cylinder or rod is still there next to the planet venus.
content.summary: A short bright glowing stationary rod only observable in binoculars near venus

content.detailedDescription: I was in my living room looking at orion's belt when a fast moving chevron raced through space from north to south. it had red-orange lights that were not flashing. it was clearly a chevron. i was scared by it.
content.summary: Looking at orion's belt; observed flying chevron to right of constellation. flew very quickly but could see it til it dipped below horizon. similar in form to huge craft i saw 3/11/13 traveling west to east at much slower speed

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Just like every day before the incident and after, i watch the sky for hours sometimes. the sun had a peculiar rainbow around the sun. it looked cool enough to take a picture. when i looked at the pictures i was surprised to see a big red eye ball looking ship. the object pretty much just hovered within the boundaries of the rainbow. the ship became visible to my eyes for a short moment. i watched it disappear. like it slipped through a tear in the fabric of time space.
content.summary: I seen a circular rainbow around the sun. it looked peculiar so i took my phone out and snapped some photos that reveal a "red eye" shaped ship.

content.detailedDescription: I have tried  to report this to three other ufo reporting station's with limited results so i am  holding information that makes this like no other because it takes time to explain unless your interested. #1-irrigating vineyard#2-beams of lights from the west panning down from 40'foot almond trees(orchard) down on to 5' grapes vineyard,approaching my ranch at 2 mph.I thought "what would a police helicopter be doing out here now?"#3#4-police helicopter.Beams moved over my head 5' to 7'-main body-specifics of beam were not comeing off body but apx.75 feet from body then were lit by unknown-i could not see "arms" projecting out.Very strange light,orange light in a perfect round cercle with like "tickertape" moveing around inside.#5-i was scared to death,didnot know to call police or run(to where?) i did call friend-he would not come over and i have to go out and shut or move water in the area of this thing! i have never been so sacred and said i was going to run over anything (gray or white) with my honda 90. i went to canal off crossroad as beams went back over my head apx.60' this time as the "potato" went downcrossroad,north 2 to 3 mph. there are things i have left out and will tell you in more detail. as beams came threw barn walls. also they reappeared 3 months later over my house in another location, only they were at about 1500',cars on highway 99 were stopping and looking (or photographing). thank-you.J. ahlstrand
content.summary: The "beams" were 3' to5' cercumference.Main body- black potato.

content.detailedDescription:
Observing out the window of a house.
thought i saw a twinkling star.
see short description section for object and actions.
was extremely frightened.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Appeared to be small twinkling star, then shot left and right several times, then swung around behing house and appeared very large & hovered over large evergreen tree for several minutes, then shot off back to where first sited, then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: We went to skate at the park my boyfriend and i sat in the car talking for 15 minutes and i noticed a ship twinkling blue and red lights hovering to my left,it was trying to get my attention i looked then it started to go up ,left,down then up then down,we got out the car and the n it drove in in front of us and went straight up towards the moon and stopped pretending to be a star wr starred at it then went to get in the car,it followed us to the store and waited for us to come out.We drove home it followed us every turn we made it made when we got home three of them were out front over the house we watched as some went straight up to outerspace,we went to bed.
content.summary: Passed by then went fast towards outer space then sat and chased our car for 5 minutes ,followed us to store then waited for us to come out followed us home

content.detailedDescription: My wife was going to his part time and send me the picture by whatsup like around 5.30 pm balls playing in the sky and ligths falling down when she take the picture she doesn't see the metalic ufo .I let her know when i see the picture.
content.summary: Ufo make circles like playing to show me

content.detailedDescription: My wife was going to his part time and send me the picture by whatsup like around 5.30 pm balls playing in the sky and ligths falling down when she take the picture she doesn't see the metalic ufo .I let her know when i see the picture.
content.summary: Ufo make circles like playing to show me

content.detailedDescription:
We went to marfa, texas to see the marfa lights. this was november 25, 2015. we didn't think we saw a thing until we got home and looked at our photos. we got two pictures of the lights and this one in particular is quite interesting, not of the light, but of a shiny object in the background near the horizon on the bottom left hand side of the frame. my husband was excited at first and now he is not. 

the only reason i am submitting just one photo is because you have a member on your board who is from texas and might be familiar with the terrain. i assure you that in the distance in front of those mountains there is no road anywhere. to be very specific these photos were taken between valentine, texas and ryan, texas about 40 minutes outside marfa. 

i think i have a few other object like photos but on that account my husband firmly disagrees. i don't.
content.summary: We were on vacation for the west texas holiday. we went to marfa, texas to see the marfa lights. we didnt' think we saw a thing till we got home and looked at our film. the photo we have attached is one of three but my husband only wants me to post one.

content.detailedDescription: I was filming the sky trying out a new 920nm infrared pass filter with my sony dcr dvd160e camcorder. suddenly, this extremely bright light came into shot right above me. it made no noise and appeared to change shape as it flew east. the first sign of the object in the footage seems to show a semi transparent round blob in the sky. then the sun obviously lights it up which can be seen in the footage. the object was only seen in the camcorder, not with naked eye.
content.summary: Ufo captured on infrared camera.. close!

content.detailedDescription:
Just finished night shift at work and as i walked to my car i glanced up to look at the moon and venus.
a orange rectangular light was passing directly over my head, as soon as i saw it i thought it was a ufo.
it was flying very low making a swishing sound but was bigger than a small plane or helicopter and to low to be a large plane.
i was excited about what i was seeing but my words wouldnt come out when i tried to tell workmates.
lost sight of it after it flew over the factory towards the a38 and m1.
content.summary: Orange rectangle light possibly on bottom of craft making swishing noise.

content.detailedDescription: It's was late at night couldn't sleep so i had got up and walked down to the river to set on the the dock. i had been there about 10 to 15 mins i heard this sound up above me like somthing was flying fast though the air. i didn't even hear it untill it past me then after about 3 seconds you couldn't hear that. i looked up and seen 2 dark objects flew past 250 to 500ft over head. no lights of any type. it was completely silent for the most part all you could hear was them cutting though the wind/air.. i'm now thinking to myself what is that ducks maybe it is that time of year for them to be in the area. but ducks don't fly at night normally but they do roost right around the gulf right in the detection these things were heading i guess that's what it was i say to myself.. this is were you gone think i'm crazy these objects are just seconds away from being out of sight now the are over the gulf now they make a turn back to the west and one stars glowing orangesh red then the second one starts glowing. they keep heading west untill over the marsh they seam to be running the tree line right at the marsh the one speeded up and went out of sight. but the other slowed down and looked as if it came to a complete stop and was hovering and started to move up and down like a yoyo it dun that for about 30 to 45 seconds and then it started getting real dim then on a down stroke it went out or somthing .I set there about 2 more hours but nothing i get up and head back to the house .After i get back home i think i could see it though the trees i could see somthing .So i jump in the car  ride back down to the river but it was gone i did see a light though the trees but can't be a 100% if it was the same thing . i have no idea what the heck it was but i can tell you this i've lost some sleep over it since then
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 object flew over head silnet all you could hear was them cutting though the air they started to glow after over the gulf then turned west

content.detailedDescription: I went out side to take pics of jupiter and when i reviewed them i saw this ship in the shot. the planet was high in the sky and with no obstructions i don't know how it happened.
content.summary: I took some photos trying to get the planet jupiter and when i looked at them i saw the ship in the shots

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside (westheimer road 9400 block) when my apartment security guard said what is that and i turned around and saw what appeared to be a moving glowing ball of fire. i ran to my apartment and grabbed my cell phone and recorded this off my cell phone. i saw about seven of these what appeared to be balls of fire flying at a very low speed of about 6 to 10 miles an hour and an altitude of 500 feet off the ground from the southeast of houston to the northwest direction one after the other about 30 to 40 seconds apart for a total of 5 then two more about five minutes later moving in the exact same direction. very strange i had a security guard and my mother and witness the event and a car stopped & several neighbors which i took this video and several photos of the objects. i also got a pair of binoculars from my parked car glove compartment and observed the object and several others and it appeared to be a transparent sphere with fire inside but not a burning fire but almost like a sun but moving inside and there was a faint manta ray frame on the underside of the sphere not sure if that was solid or a shadow. i only saw one object moving across the sky at a time. i was able to take several different videos and two pictures. this event was witnessed by our apartment security guard, my mother and a car that stopped to look in the parking lot.
content.summary: I saw what appeared to be a glowing ball of fire move slowly across the sky and made no noise and then i saw 6 more over next 23 minutes with several witnesses and got video and pictures.

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of 4 december 2015, at approximately 1135hrs, i observed two very bright lights near highway 24 and interstate 495 in plymouth/bristol county, ma. the lights were in the sky to the south and southwest. i was closer to bridgewater at the time, but the lights appeared to be in the direction of taunton, ma. the sky was clear and i could observe stars in the night sky. i first noticed the lights as i was about to take the exit to highway 24 north from i-495. both lights were orange in color, similar to the color of the flame from a lighter. the lights were larger than what a planet or star typically looks like in the sky and did not appear to be moving. i would estimate their size to be about the size of a number 2 pencil eraser.  one light was approximately 45° from the horizon and the other light appeared to be approximately 30° from the horizon. i had no frame of reference to judge the distance from me or the true distance between each light. from my point of view, the lights appeared to be about 2 to 3 inches from each other. the lights were not blinking and had not other color flashing lights around them. my first thought was the lights were aircraft on approach into boston logan international. i did observe an aircraft with strobe lights, nav lights, and landing lights in the area. the two lights and the aircraft were not comparable in appearance or action(movement). the two lights did not look like typical aircraft. i continued to observe the lights as i made the exit and continued around the exit ramp to highway 24 north. the lights did not appear to be moving. while i had no fixed point of reference, i could tell the aircraft i observed in the area was moving. at that point, i looked for street lights around the highway exit and did not notice any that would appear that high in the sky. once i was on 24, i could still see the lights behind me and to my left. i was able to see the objects until i exited the highway about 2 miles up the road. the entire incident was approximately 2 minutes in total. i thought perhaps i had observed planets or stars that appeared brighter than normal, but tonight (5 december 15) i was traveling the same route with very similar sky conditions and did not observe any star or other lights in that part of the sky. i attached a few maps with the location/direction the lights appeared to be and marked the location with a drop pin. i was traveling east on i495 and then north on highway 24. i did not attempt to photograph the lights.
content.summary: Two orange lights observed near bridgewater, ma

content.detailedDescription: Fireball looking object observed at 4:42 pm on december 05, 2015 in broomfield colorado while driving north on lowell blvd from 120th ave. object appeared to be descending with trail of light that was white/yellow/red in color. after observing the object for several minutes  it did not appear to loose altitude at all and looked as if it was hovering in place. at approximately 4:48pm the object appeared to change directions and the tail of light dissipated. the object now appeared to look like a glowing ball at this time. the object slowly moved in a north west direction and finally over the mountains at approximately 4:51pm. my first reaction when i initially noticed the object was to record it using my cell phone.  i also contacted my mother and father in westminster at about 4:45 pm. they live close to the airport in westminster and i wanted to see if they would have a better vantage point to the object. they were able to visualize it as well but stated it was not an airplane.  they were with me on the phone as the object disappeared over the mountains
content.summary: Fireball descended then hovered stationary for about 5 minutes and then flew towards the west over the mountains.

content.detailedDescription: Was watching tv and i heard sirens. i look out my back door thats when i noticed the light. i watched it for a few seconds then i started to record. i heard no sign of airplane or helicopter. the object slowly seemed to hover and move from left to right in a small circular pattern. the flickering in the video is from the craft passing behind tree branches that was about 25 feet in front of me. the light remained solid and constant brightness the entire time i viewed it.  i then walked into the next room to get a better view since there was a tree blocking my view. it took  less than 10 seconds to walk to the next room and the object had completely disappeared from the horizon. i walked back into the same room i originally saw the object and it was gone. it was a "wtf" moment and i'm still confused. i'm no ufo expert but i spend a lot of time looking into the void of space hoping for an encounter. i know what shooting stars, airplanes, helicopters, balloons, satellites etc look like in the night sky. this was totally unique and bizarre. i hope you can shine some light on my encounter either man made or extraterrestrial.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright center white light two smaller green lights on  l & r   red light lower r of white center

content.detailedDescription:
As a mufon member and daily skywatcher (not to mention private pilot and fervent aircraft buff), i know most exiting aircraft.  i use my 20x50 binocs when watching aircraft to identify the type (mainly 747 - 777, md-80 and airbus, occasional military & corporate jets, some commercial helicopters).  

on dec. 5 at 1:30 pm est, on a clear day full of blue sky and no clouds, while watching a 767 (i believe), i caught a dark grey or black diamond shaped aircraft (?), moving in the opposite direction. most commercial jets are flying in the 33,000 foot or so range, and this craft looked to be the same size as the jet, but at a higher altitude (although this could simply be a misperception). what i noticed was the following:

1. all commercial jets were leaving pure white contrails (chemtrails??) that day, yet the object in question had no contrail whatsoever

2. the object, which was diamond/hexagonal shape looked like a dark grey (or black) surface, with a silver/ lite grey (possibly white) border on the edge of the diamond, all around the object, covering about 10-20% of the surface area. 

3. i noticed either a thermal distortion, similar to heat haze from jet engine exhaust, yet it could also have been the kind of inferior mirage seen of electrostatic discharges from artificial gravity drives.  

4. from my knowledge of air force black programs, this could have been the aurora, because after observing this craft for roughly 2-3 minutes while it travelled at conventional velocity (500 mph or so), as i was watching it intently with my binoculars, it instantly disappeared - either an "instantaneous" acceleration, or a  "jump" of some kind (an anti gravity 'warp', or the like).

i searched the skies for another minute or two, but knew it had left the area. if i were a betting man, i would say it was either the aurora (or "licorice drop") - the commercial traffic would have seen it on his radar.
content.summary: While observing aircraft, diamond craft observed in flight then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I pulled into the parking lot where my daughter works to drop her off. it is on a very dark road without much illumination. it's mostly farmland in the suburbs. she got out of the car and before she even shut the door i saw her staring at something towards the western sky. "dad come take a look at this!" she said to me. i got out of the car and followed the finger she was pointing at the sky. that's when i saw it too.

an extremely bright, round, yellow, object was moving across the sky in a straight line heading east. it was super bright and the both of us could easily follow it with our eyes. it left no tail and made no sound whatsoever. it most definitely was not a plane as it seemed to move differently, more smoothly than a plane and it was in no way a helicopter.

"what is it?" she asked me which was funny because i was just about to ask her the same exact question. we continued to watch it travelling east until it disappeared over the tree line. i'm not thinking it was a meteor as there was no tail and it seemed to move to slowly to be a meteor. it was round, a glowing, round object. we have no clue what it was, but it sincerely didn't seem or feel natural.
content.summary: Solid, bright, yellow, round, object moving smoothly across the sky at a speed which i could easily follow

content.detailedDescription: I was picking up my child from school and noticed an object the same color as clouds moving. i didnt notice anything strange until i realized that there were no clouds and the skies were clear. i witnessed the object for a few minutes. a tree obstructed my view so i stood up from the bench i was sitting on and it was gone. at first it appeared to be a parachute but there was nobody on it. not sure what it was
content.summary: Norwood creek elementary

content.detailedDescription:
We were traveling south of boyd, texas along farm road 730 about 1am. i was in the backseat, having laid down after spending most of the night "looking for ufos" (i had seen one the november prior (1974) and was anxious to see another), but tiring of looking at the night sky, i decided to rest the remainder of the drive home. not two minutes went by when my mother and my brother started shouting. i popped up to see what the yelling was about, and mom explained that there was a bright blue ball in the sky on the driver's side, traveling the same direction as us, and that it descended in a zig-zag pattern out of sight beyond some trees about a half-mile to our left. these were trees that lined the trinity river bottoms that lay between our car and our destination, which was our house located along these bottoms.  this trinity river formed the northern border of our land.

the made-for-tv movie about betty & barney hill had *just* been aired in the week prior, and having seen the movie, mom was especially upset, convinced that the same creatures that got the hills were now coming to get us. she calmed down and was able to sleep but not for awhile. the sighting was very exciting but also upsetting to her. later, she was mostly fascinated by the color of the object, that it was "the most beautiful blue" color she'd ever seen.  she talked about how beautiful it was until she died. she was always convinced that it was among the kinds of things people were seeing a lot of in those days. we heard a lot of other stories.  as much as people out there might keep such a thing private, there's also plenty of sharing of stories, so there tends to be more of an open mind toward it than you'd think. country folk out there love a good legend, be it ghost or ufo.

the incident that night was the second sighting by our family in just two months. the nov. prior -- nov. 19 1974 to be exact -- my mother, my grandmother, and i saw a different object -- amber-colored, bright, and shaped like a saucer on its edge -- that moved at a high rate of speed across the northern part of the sky at dusk.  i was a young boy of 10, and i made a "flip book" out of one of my mom's old check books, to draw how the object skipped like a flat rock on water as it moved. 

in the area where we lived, our family had - i would count - five fairly dramatic sightings of various objects, all different, and spanning the period between the 1950s to the 1970s. of these, a daytime sighting by my great-uncle, a well-known peanut farmer in that area -- involved a silver sphere that was seen to descend at just about the same spot where the big blue ball also seemed to have come down.
content.summary: Traveled in the same direction as our car was traveling, then zig-zagged down below trees that were at a distance.
